page.title: 01Area N.E. Kilcoo Village
page.content: Kilcoo is farming community of intensively managed and rough grazing types. Area is dominated by three features. 1. Tullynasoo Mountain (sheep farming) 2. Lough Island Reservoir (linked to Belfast Supply) 3. Pre Christian settlements shwing preserved souterrains cashels etc. most prominent 'Dromena Cashel'. Farms are small, 20 acres average. Three small housing estates in area. Those not engaged in farming work in surrounding towns or travel to building sites in Belfast (30 miles)
